Name: Ji
MapDesc: Subcortical resting state parcellation in 10 networks
ShortDesc: Subcortical restingstate parcellation: Ji et al. (2019)
LongDesc: Ji et al. (2019) presented a parcellation of subcortical structures based on correlation with 10 cortical networks, based on the HCP resting state data.
ReferencesAndLinks: Ji, J. L., Spronk, M., Kulkarni, K., Repovš, G., Anticevic, A., & Cole, M. W. (2019). Mapping the human brain's cortical-subcortical functional network organization. Neuroimage, 185, 35-57.
